title: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it in Photon
description: When attempting to click on the first Combo, it does not take focus as expected in the Photon version. However, if I drop down the combo list, it will take focus.
OB: When clicking on the first Combo in Photon, it does not take focus.
EB: When clicking on the first Combo in Photon, it should take focus.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the "Add a new CVS Repository" dialog. 2. Press the "Tab" key and observe that the focus goes to the second Combo "Repository Path:".
